ai-atk-s0303a9:0_0: commentary on the colour of scents,
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_1: Because of the fairies scented to roots and trees, because of the opposite fragrances.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_2: for the whole of the tree is flowing.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_3: The same method applies in the same way.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_5: Whoever has come here at the root of a tree such a scent compati,
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_7: Firstly, all the roots are only.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_8: They give gifts of fragrant roots, heartwood, and flowers. They grow disillusioned with the streams of strings, perfumes, and garlands.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_9: In this way the meaning should be understood in all ways.
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_10: So too when they leave the household drive out the house and do not yearning -
ai-atk-s0303a9:1_11: when he is shown thus, he does not give to the ten kinds of gifts, etc., for the purpose of giving a gift.
ai-atk-s0303a9:2_0: The Linked Discourses on fairykind is finished.
